sub_title: Senior Executive | Business Development | External Relations | Program Management | Strategic Analysis | Risk Management
summary:
A globally-focused, senior executive with extensive experience in business development, advising and consulting at the highest levels of U.S. and foreign governments. Experienced in leading teams to generate results-oriented strategic analysis, identifying new opportunities to shape policy and engagement in international military cooperation. Proven expertise in international negotiations, government-to-government relations, and program managment. Thrives in fluid environments; expert in creating solutions amidst uncertainty. Fluent in French and Italian; conversant in Dutch. Active U.S. Department of Defense security clearance.

Global Experience – consistently successfully delivered complex international projects   

Market Development - informed analysis that leverages foreign and US national policy to maximize ROI

Skilled Leader - led teams to exceptional performance 

Innovator - skilled at finding and exploiting opportunities competitors miss 

Critical Thinker -  equip senior leadership with wisdom and trend evaluation they can use almost intuitively internationally
